reference.shortdesc: The task context provides background information that helps users understand the purpose of the task and what they will gain by completing it.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: This section should be brief and does not replace or recreate a concept topic on the same subject, although the context section might include some conceptual information.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The context element is specialized from the section element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <task id="sqlj"> <title>Creating an SQLJ file</title> <taskbody> <context>Once you have set up SQLJ, you need to create a new SQLJ file.</context> </taskbody> </task>
